answers.answer: Nature Made Iron 65 mg. Most common side effect is Gastrointestinal distress when taken on an empty stomach.Have you had a blood test to see if you’re low in iron? If you’re not then don’t take it!! Studies have shown that mildly excessive levels of stored iron showed an association with heart disease, cancer and type 2 diabetes! It doesn't mean it causes these problems but shows a connection.

You may need two multivitamins plus 50 to 100 mg of elemental iron each day. There are no such side effects of these vitan\mins and supplements but syill i would say that you must take any vitamin under specialist reccomdation.

question: I am 51 yr old and gastro-bypass surgery when I was 29.  What is the best over the counter iron supplement for me to take?  And what are the side effects?
title: iron supplement
